hero.title: Building the future and the present of the web
hero.description: Passionate Full Stack Developer focused on performance, SEO, and scalable architecture, crafting efficient and user-friendly web experiences.

plan.title: Plan - Strategy & Architecture
plan.description: We start by understanding your business needs and goals. I create a clear roadmap, selecting the right technologies to ensure scalability, performance, and maintainability.

build.title: Build – Full-Stack Development
build.description: From frontend UI to backend APIs, I develop fast, secure, and user-friendly applications tailored to your project's vision. Clean code, best practices, and seamless integrations are my priority

scale.title: Scale – Optimization & Growth
scale.description: Once launched, I ensure your app runs at peak performance. Speed, SEO, and security enhancements help you reach more users while keeping your platform efficient and future-proof

about.title: About Me
about.specializeIn: I specialize in building responsive, high-performance web applications with modern frameworks and best practices for accessibility and SEO.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out through any of these channels.
